entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Existing TextDecorations applied to a Label are not removed when a new TextDecoration value is set after the Label's Text has been modified #16967
  • Nested CollectionViews aren't rendered correctly in iOS and MacCatalyst #16966
  • .NET MAUI does not support Arabic language (RTL) on iOS devices #16964
  • Android CollectionView leaks if given a header or footer #16961
    Backlog
  • AppThemeBinding in VisualState prevents from updating Button.Background #16960
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent content length calling WCF service #16957
  • Issue with Code Execution on iOS When Minimizing the Application #16954
  • Make KeyboardAutoManager public #16949
    Backlog
  • codesign exited with code 1 #16948
  • Button control's IsEnabled property not works if used with Command property. #16947
    Backlog
  • Black splash screen on iOS device and simulator #16945

Closed

  • CollectionView with default VerticalOptions: Android does not scroll, iOS incomplete scroll #15402
    .NET 8 GA
  • Cursor position is at the beginning of entry/editor #14707
    Backlog
  • Rendering with MaximumHeightRequest is inconsistent across platforms #16953
  • iOS Binding library for XCFramework fails with dependant frameworks #16959
  • [Enhancement] Hot Reload: improve x:Name API #622
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] CarouselView layout issues #16322
    .NET 8 GA
  • CarouselView on Windows totally broken #12850
    Backlog
  • [Windows] CarouselView Layout is broken #13057
    Backlog
  • Carousel View does not behave properly in Windows #12567
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] [Windows] `WidthRequest="0"` in `Grid` crashes the app #16475
    .NET 8 GA
  • BlazorWebView - Mouse Events not being triggered in Android #16875
  • [regression/not fixed in 8.0.0-rc.1.9012] Binding Issue: Multiple platform CheckBox control 'IsChecked' #16926
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix #16470 - [Android] Improvements to TabbedPage API #16965
    community ✨
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8.0.0-rc.1.23419.3 #16963
  • [RC1] Implement Platform Args for Drag and Drop EventArgs #16962
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, area/platform
  • [WinUI] Fix exception when adding items to a linear layout CollectionView #16958
  • Use a fixed WinUI window size for Appium test app #16956
  • Windows CollectionView TapGesture from keyboard #16952
  • Avoid NRE if no shell items are visible #16946

Merged

  • Handlers should not implement `IImageSourcePartSetter` directly #16901
    .NET 8 GA
  • [UITest] Add a timeout to the appium server startup #16939
    area/testing
  • [core] use factory methods for registering services #16741
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [windows] Fixed CarouselView items rendering #16842
    partner/cat 😻, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested, backport/approved, .NET 8 GA
  • [workload] Only install the WinUI pack on Windows #16937
    area/setup 🪄
  • [uitests] Bump versions and fix script #16917
  • [UITest] Get the tabbedpage UI test working #16905
    area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16944
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Updates for dotnet/runtime #16904
    .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • Add interface to expose out UIView methods #16868
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Add GetPosition method to DragStartingEventArgs, DragEventArgs, and DropEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Default paths for Appium projects, to simplify run steps #16763
    area/testing
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [android] Fixed ListView visibility and opacity on Android #16941
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.7.0 #16888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix so updating FlyoutItemIsVisible hides/shows shell menu item #16942
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    .NET 8 GA
